title: Investor Meeting Prep
content: Prepare slides: traction metrics, LTV/CAC, burn rate, hiring plan. Anticipate questions on churn and roadmap.

title: Engineering Hiring Plan
content: Plan hiring for backend and infra engineers. Prioritize reliability and observability hires for next two quarters.

title: Key Customer Feedback
content: Notes from recent customer interviews highlighting need for bulk import and better API docs.
